Detailed Description

Provides header information an event such as event number and timestamp.

const TTimeStamp& ldmx::EventHeader::getTimestamp (  )  const [inline]

Get the event's timestamp. This currently returns second's since the epoch for simulated events.

Returns:
The event's timestamp.
Note:
The returned object has a possible resolution of nanoseconds.
